General.Name: Seoam Machinery Industry Co.Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: Seoam Machinery Industry Co.,Ltd. produces, sells, and exports parts for various gears, chucks and cylinders, and curvic couplings in South Korea and internationally. It also offers reducers and special machines. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Gwangju-si, South Korea.
